Name: require_task_status_done
Description: Only tasks with status 'done' are valid

Name: require_user_story_status_done
Description: Only completed user stories are included

Name: require_role_area_defined
Description: Only roles with defined area of responsibility

Name: require_sprint_goal_achievement_met
Description: Only sprints with achieved goals are valid

Name: require_velocity_trend_positive
Description: Only consider teams with positive velocity trend

Name: require_dev_test_status_passed
Description: Only snapshots with passed tests are valid
